an10.174:4.1: “Mendicants, I say that killing living creatures is threefold:
an10.174:4.2: caused by greed, hate, or delusion.
an10.174:5.1: I say that stealing is threefold:
an10.174:5.2: caused by greed, hate, or delusion.
an10.174:6.1: I say that sexual misconduct is threefold:
an10.174:6.2: caused by greed, hate, or delusion.
an10.174:7.1: I say that lying is threefold:
an10.174:7.2: caused by greed, hate, or delusion.
an10.174:8.1: I say that divisive speech is threefold:
an10.174:8.2: caused by greed, hate, or delusion.
an10.174:9.1: I say that harsh speech is threefold:
an10.174:9.2: caused by greed, hate, or delusion.
an10.174:10.1: I say that meaningless speech is threefold:
an10.174:10.2: caused by greed, hate, or delusion.
an10.174:11.1: I say that covetousness is threefold:
an10.174:11.2: caused by greed, hate, or delusion.
an10.174:12.1: I say that ill will is threefold:
an10.174:12.2: caused by greed, hate, or delusion.
an10.174:13.1: I say that wrong view is threefold:
an10.174:13.2: caused by greed, hate, or delusion.
an10.174:13.3: And so greed, hate, and delusion are sources and origins for deeds.
an10.174:13.4: With the ending of greed, hate, and delusion, the sources of deeds are ended.”
